name: Fritz Kreisler
info:
• 简体中文名: 弗里兹·克莱斯勒
  • 别名: Friedrich "Fritz" Kreisler
  • 别名: フリッツ・クライスラー
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1875年2月2日
  • 祭日: 1962年1月29日
detail: Friedrich "Fritz" Kreisler (February 2, 1875 – January 29, 1962) was an Austrian-born violinist and composer.[1] One of the most famous violin masters of his or any other day, and regarded as one of the greatest violinists of all time, he was known for his sweet tone and expressive phrasing. Like many great violinists of his generation, he produced a characteristic sound which was immediately recognizable as his own. Although it derived in many respects from the Franco-Belgian school, his style is nonetheless reminiscent of the gemütlich (cozy) lifestyle of pre-war Vienna.

works.name: 四月は君の嘘 トゥインクル リトルスター
四月は君の嘘 僕と君との音楽帳 / 四月是你的谎言 我和你的音乐帐
